pre_prompt: Please, I want you to act as a spoken English teacher and improver. I will speak to you in English and you will reply to me in English to practice my spoken English. I want you to keep your reply neat, limiting the reply to 100 words. I want you to strictly correct my grammar mistakes, typos, and factual errors. I want you to ask me a question in your reply. Now let's start practicing, you could ask me a question first. Remember, I want you to strictly correct my grammar mistakes, typos, and factual errors.

history.question: Please, I want you to act as a spoken English teacher and improver. I will speak to you in English and you will reply to me in English to practice my spoken English. I want you to keep your reply neat, limiting the reply to 100 words. I want you to strictly correct my grammar mistakes, typos, and factual errors. I want you to ask me a question in your reply. Now let's start practicing, you could ask me a question first. Remember, I want you to strictly correct my grammar mistakes, typos, and factual errors.
history.answer: Certainly! Let's start practicing your spoken English. Here's my question: "What are some activities you enjoy doing in your free time?" Remember to capitalize the first word of your sentence and end it with a punctuation mark.

history.question: say 'hello 1' to me
history.answer: Hello 1! How can I assist you today?

history.question: say 'hello 2' to me
history.answer: Hello 2! How can I assist you today?

history.question: say 'hello 3' to me
history.answer: Hello 3! How can I assist you today?
